sen.j: 伏見宮貞敦親王（ふしみのみや さだあつしんのう、長享2年（1488年）3月 - 元亀3年7月25日 （1572年9月2日））は、戦国時代の皇族。
sen.e: Imperial Prince Fushimi-no-miya Sadaatsu (1488 - September 2, 1572) was the Imperial Family member during the period of Warring States.
Imperial Prince Fushimi-no-miya Sadaatsu (1488 - September 2, 1572) was the Imperial Family member during the period of Warring States.
Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Sadaatsu (March, 1488 - September 2, 1572) was the Imperial family member during the Sengoku period (period of warring states).
sen.cmt: ハイフン削除戦国時代→the Sengoku period (period of warring states)March補足。family小文字にしました。

sen.e: He was Nakatsukasakyo (chief of the Ministry of Central Affairs) and Shikibukyo. (chief of the Ministry of Ceremonial)
He was Nakatsukasakyo (chief of the Ministry of Central Affairs) and Shikibukyo (chief of the Ministry of Ceremonies).
He was Nakatsukasakyo (chief of the Ministry of Central Affairs) and Shikibukyo (chief of the Ministry of Ceremonies).
The sixth family head of the Fushiminomiya family.
The sixth family head of the Fushiminomiya family.
The sixth family head of the Fushiminomiya family.

sen.j: 伏見宮邦高親王第一王子。
sen.e: The first Prince of Imperial Prince Fushimi-no-miya Kunitaka.
The first Prince of Imperial Prince Fushimi-no-miya Kunitaka.
The first Prince of Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Kunitaka.
His mother was Norisue IMADEGAWA's daughter.
His mother was Norisue IMADEGAWA's daughter.
His mother was Norisue IMADEGAWA's daughter.

sen.j: 文亀2年（1502年）に元服、永正元年（1504年）に親王宣下。
sen.e: He had a coming-of-age ceremony in 1502 and received to title to become Imperial Prince in 1504.
He had a coming-of-age ceremony in 1502 and received the title of Imperial Prince in 1504.
He had a coming-of-age ceremony in 1502 and received the title of Imperial Prince in 1504.
He entered into priesthood in 1545.
He entered into the priesthood in 1545.
He entered into the priesthood in 1545.

sen.j: 王子女に、伏見宮邦輔親王、尭尊法親王、応胤入道親王など。
sen.e: His children were Imperial Prince Fushimi-no-miya Kunisuke, Imperial Prince Gyoson (Buddhist Priest), Imperial Prince and Monk Oin.
His children were Imperial Prince Fushimi-no-miya Kunisuke, Imperial Prince Gyoson (Buddhist Priest), Imperial Prince and Monk Oin.
His children were Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Kunisuke, Cloistered Imperial Prince Gyoson (Buddhist Priest), priestly Imperial Prince Oin.
sen.cmt: ハイフン削除法親王→Cloistered Imperial Prince に訂正しました。(Buddhist Priest)初出以外削除。入道親王→priestly Imperial Prince に訂正しました。
